sentence.Network_en: They cost nine pounds new, three pounds secondhand.

sentence.Network_en: I bought a secondhand chair which is as good as new.
sentence.Network_cn: 我买了一把二手货椅子,它如同新的一样.

entry.def: Second-hand things are not new and have been owned by someone else.

example.ex: Buying a second-hand car can be a risky business.

entry.def: A second-hand shop sells second-hand goods.

entry.tran: (故事、观点、信息)第二手的，间接的，非亲身经历的
entry.def: Second-hand stories, information, or opinions are those you learn about from other people rather than directly or from your own experience.

example.ex: He conceded that second-hand accounts are leading to rumour and counter-rumour...
example.tran: 他承认道听途说会引发谣言和辟谣。

example.ex: The denunciation was made on the basis of second-hand information.
example.tran: 这些指责是依据二手信息提出的。

means.word_mean: 1. derived from what is primary or original; not firsthand;

sentences.sentence: "a secondhand account of a memory of something once read"

means.word_mean: 2. previously used or owned by another;

sentences.sentence: "I heard about it only secondhand or thirdhand"

auth_sentence.content: Secondhand impressions are as worthless as secondhand morality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Secondhand impressions are as worthless as secondhand morality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Secondhand impressions are as worthless as secondhand morality.

auth_sentence.content: Hands down the best secondhand shopping in Milan.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hands down the best secondhand shopping in Milan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hands down the best secondhand shopping in Milan.

auth_sentence.content: Match these details with similar items at secondhand furnishing shops.
auth_sentence.res_content: Match these details with similar items at secondhand furnishing shops.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Match these details with similar items at secondhand furnishing shops.

sentences.en: He happened on the book in a secondhand bookstore.
sentences.cn: 他在旧书店里偶然发现了这本书。

sentences.en: Do you know where I can get hold of a secondhand carpet cleaner?
sentences.cn: 你知道我在哪里可以弄到旧的地毯吸尘器吗?

sentences.en: As I was looking through some books on a secondhand bookstall,I dropped on just what I wanted.
sentences.cn: 当我在旧书摊浏览书籍时,我意外地找到了我所需要的书。

means.word_mean: <贬>(消息、信息等)间接得来的;二手的

sentences.en: I bought a secondhand chair which is as good as new.
sentences.cn: 我买了一把二手货椅子,它如同新的一样。

sentences.en: They sell new and secondhand computers.
sentences.cn: 他们卖新电脑和二手电脑。
